    • start

      public void start()
      This method is called by the controller when the player wants to start the solo game. It gives the leaders to the player (4 cards, in which 2 to be chosen). It positions the blackCross on the Faith Track.
      Overrides:
      start in class Game

    • notifyInitialState

      private void notifyInitialState()
      Utility method used to notify the view of the initial state of the market and of the developDecks

    • chooseLeaders

      public void chooseLeaders​(java.lang.String player, Message message) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called when the player chooses his leaders.
      Overrides:
      chooseLeaders in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      message - is the message that contains all the info about the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when one or both indexes are missing

    • notifyTurn

      private void notifyTurn()
      Utility method used to notify the view that is the turn of the currentPlayer

    • notifyLeaders

      private void notifyLeaders​(java.lang.String action)
      Utility method used to notify the view that the currentPlayer needs to choose his leaders or to notify him of the correct selection of the leaders
      Parameters:
      action - the action that is to be sent to the player (choose leader: the player needs to choose his leaders, the id of the leaders between the player needs to choose are sent; ok leaders: the selection of the leaders is correct and the id of the selected leaders are sent)

    • buy

      public void buy​(java.lang.String player, Message message) throws InvalidActionException, java.lang.NumberFormatException
      This method is used for a buy move during the turn.
      Overrides:
      buy in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored.
      message - is the message that contains all the info about the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - if the format is not valid.

    • notifyBuy

      private void notifyBuy​(int slot, int bought, int col, int row)
      Utility method used to notify the view that the buy action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of deposits and strongbox, the id of the new top card for the deck from where he bought the card, and the id of the bought card
      Parameters:
      slot - the index of the slot where the player put the bought card
      bought - the id of the bought card
      col - the col of the deck where the player bought the card
      row - the row of the deck where the player bought the card

    • produce

      public void produce​(java.lang.String player, Message message) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when the player decided to activate productions. It calls the player's produce method.
      Overrides:
      produce in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      message - is the message that contains all the info about the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifyProduce

      private void notifyProduce()
      Utility method used to notify the view of the corrected execution of a produce action. It sends to the view the new situation of the deposits and strongbox of the player that did the action

    • fromMarket

      public void fromMarket​(java.lang.String player, Message message) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for taking resources from the Market
      Overrides:
      fromMarket in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      message - is the message that contains all the info about the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifyMarket

      private void notifyMarket​(java.lang.String chosen, int value)
      Utility method used to notify the view that a fromMarket action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of the deposits and strongbox, the new situation of the market and the new positions of the client faithmarker and of the blackCross
      Parameters:
      chosen - row or col of the market chosen by the player
      value - the index of the row or col

    • swapDeposit

      public void swapDeposit​(java.lang.String player, Message message) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used for a swapDeposit move during the turn.
      Overrides:
      swapDeposit in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      message - is the message that contains all the info about the action.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifySwap

      private void notifySwap()
      Utility method used to notify the view that the swap action went fine. It sends to the client the new situation of the deposits and strongbox

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(java.lang.String player, int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when the player decided to activate a leader. It calls the player's activateLeader method.
      Overrides:
      activateLeader in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      pos - it represents the leader that the player wants to activate
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(java.lang.String player, int pos) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when the player decided to discard a leader. It calls the player's discardLeader method.
      Overrides:
      discardLeader in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      pos - it represents the leader that the player wants to discard
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifyLeaderAction

      private void notifyLeaderAction​(java.lang.String action, int pos)
      Utility method used to notify the view of a corrected execution of a leader action (activate/discard). it sends to the view the index of the activated/discarded leader, the action performed and the new position of the player (if the leader has been discarded)
      Parameters:
      action - the action performed
      pos - the new position of the player

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn​(java.lang.String player) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is called by the controller when the player decided to end his turn. It activates the Pope's reports if needed (setting or discarding the FavorTiles of each player) and controls if the game is at the end: if so, if the player won, it counts his points notify that he is the winner; otherwise, it notifies that he lost.
      Overrides:
      endTurn in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - is ignored
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the move is not valid.

    • notifyEndTurn

      private void notifyEndTurn​(int token)
      Utility method used to notify the corrected execution of the end turn action. It sends to the view the new situation of the player's FavorTile. This method also sends the current position of the blackCross and the activated token
      Parameters:
      token - is the activated token at the end of the turn

    • notifyEndGame

      private void notifyEndGame​(boolean win, int points)
      This method notifies the view that the game is ended. It sends the client the points scored and if he won or lost
      Parameters:
      win - boolean indicating if the client won
      points - the points scored by the client

    • getBlackCross

      protected FaithMarker getBlackCross()
      Method to get the black cross (JUST FOR TESTING)
      Returns:
      the blackCross

      Just for testing
